name: Eula
summary: A framework for adding End User License Agreements to an app.
description:
The Eula iOS SDK allows you to add "Terms of Service" and "Privacy Policy" documents to your application. These documents are managed by the Eula platform; therefore creating an easy way to manage "End User License Agreements".

To get started, you will need to have a free Eula account to connect to. Go to eula.io to sign up for free.
